EmailTemplate.name: Paris Air Show.Wave 3.Brunch Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Brunch at Paris Air Show 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YOU ARE INVITED
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com>
Paris Air Show 2015 Honeywell Brunch Sunday, 14 June 2015 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. Possibilities. Made Easy. Honeywell Aerospace leadership invites you to an elegant Sunday brunch at one of the most extraordinary gastronomic hideaways in Paris. Please join us in celebrating innovation and possibilities of flight. Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de Suresnes 75016 Paris
Click here to RSVP <https://pages3.honeywell.com/PAS-15-RSVP.html>
Please email emeaiaeroevents@honeywell.com <mailto:emeaiaeroevents@honeywell.com> with any questions.
